        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

            <entry>cahi1:data_083a4f73b2b101bb82f42dca3a056e439a579330</entry>

          <title>
            <string language="en">Determining the direction of magnetic fields</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Bestimmung der Richtung von magnetischem 
fängt auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Détermination de la direction des champs 
magnétiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Determinando o sentido de campos magnéticos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Determinazione del senso dei campi magnetici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθορισμός της κατεύθυνσης των μαγνητικών πεδίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Determinación de la dirección de campos 
magnéticos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations demonstrate ways to determine the direction of magnetic field inside a current-carrying solenoid (top) and around a current-carrying wire (bottom).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electromagnets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">field lines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">flat current-carrying coils</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic fields</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">north</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solenoids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wires</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen Methoden, die Richtung 
von magnetischem festzustellen auffangen Innere ein 
aktuell-tragendes Solenoid (Oberseite) und um eine aktuell-tragende 
Leitung (Unterseite).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces illustrations démontrent des voies de 
déterminer la direction du champ magnétique à l'intérieur d'un 
solénoïde actuel-portant (dessus) et autour d'un fil actuel-portant 
(bas).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações demonstram maneiras 
determinar o sentido do campo magnético dentro de um solenóide 
atual-carregando (alto) e em torno de um fio atual-carregando (fundo).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni dimostrano i modi 
determinare il senso del campo magnetico all'interno di un solenoide 
corrente-trasportante (parte superiore) ed intorno ad un legare 
corrente-trasportante (parte inferiore).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις καταδεικνύουν τους τρόπους να 
καθοριστεί η κατεύθυνση του μαγνητικού πεδίου μέσα σε ένα 
παρών-φέρνοντας σωληνοειδές (κορυφή) και γύρω από ένα 
παρών-φέρνοντας καλώδιο (κατώτατο σημείο).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones demuestran maneras de 
determinar la dirección del campo magnético dentro de un solenoide 
actual-que lleva (tapa) y alrededor de un alambre actual-que lleva 
(fondo).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kräfte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektromagneten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">fangen Sie Zeilen auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
